title: Xbot Home
descriptionHTML:
The mobile phone app connects Xbot products to the phone with Wi-Fi function.

Using the App, you replace the traditional remote control with an intelligent robot control.

The Application provides registration, initial setup, software update, cleaning control, management and receiving information from the robot vacuum cleaner.

You can adapt the robot to your lifestyle:

- make an individual cleaning schedule;

- mark contaminated and restricted areas;

- customize local cleaning and cleaning zones in specific rooms;

- adjust the cleaning modes;

- Get information about the charge level, cleaning report and error messages.

Device & app history: read your Web bookmarks and history
Photos/Media/Files: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
read the contents of your USB storage
Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
read the contents of your USB storage
